review.title: “laid back atmosphere at George R Willy PC”
review.pros: Pros – The file clerks had a lot of time to themselves. Lots of freedom was given. Friendly attorneys and legal assistants that bothered you very infrequently for things.
review.cons: Cons – There was very little instruction from management. I was taught the specifics by the current file clerk, and had to teach the next file clerk. It was not a hard concept, though.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – No advice needed. The work environment was very productive, but maybe because I like to work alone. Keep up the good work
